moves.1. e4 e6 2. d4 d5 3. Nc3 Nf6 4. e5 Nfd7:
Small inaccuracy on blacks move.
… O-O 13.  g4  Bxc3  14. bxc3 Nb6  is safer.
moves.17. Kh1: 17. gxf5  Nxf5  18. Nxf5 exf5 is the best moves in this case.
moves.18. Nxg6 hxg6 19. Rfg1 Kf7: A fairly big mistake … Qe8 19.  Rg3  fxg4  20. Rxg4 Rf5 would keep the game more even.
moves.20. Rg2 Nb6 21. Rbg1 Rg8 22. gxf5 gxf5 2: Small mistake: … Qf7 31.  Rg6  Kd8  32. Rxe6 Qxe6 is best.
moves.32... Kd8 33. Rg5g6 Re7: One more small mistake: … Qf7 33.  Qh4+  Kc7  34. Qh7 Kb8 is better.
moves.34. Na2: Mistake again.  The problem is seen in the following: 34. Na2  Qe8  35. Qg5 Kc8  36. Nb4 a5  37. Nc6 Rf7  38. Nxa5 Ra7  39. b4 cxb3 e.p. 40. Nxb3 Qe7  41. Rf6
moves.34... a5 35. Nc3 Kd7 36. Nb5 Nc8 37. Qd1:
Big blunder … Qb6 39.  Qa4+  Kb7  40. Nxd5 exd5  41. Rxb6+ Nxb6  42. Qa3 Rc7  43. Qxa5 Rc6  44. Qb5 Re6  45. Rg3 Kc7  46. Kg2

Best moves … Na7 39.  Qa3  Qc7  40. Na4 Rge8  41. Qc5+ Kb7  42. Qd6 Nc6  43. Nc5+ Kc8  44. Qxc7+ Kxc7  45. c3 Kb6  46. Rxg7 Rxg7
moves.40. Na4: Blunder.  40. Qa4+  Kb7  41. Nxd5 exd5  42. Rxb6+ Nxb6 is required.
moves.41. Nc5 Rge8: … Kc7 41.  Nxe6+  Kb8  42. Qa4 Qd7  43. Qxd7 Rxd7  44. Rxg7 Rgxg7  45. Rxg7 Rxg7  46. Nxg7 c3  47. bxc3 Ne7  48. Kg2 is much better.
moves.43. b3:
43. Nxe6  Nd6  44. exd6 Qd7  45. Nc5 Qxa4  46. Nxa4+ Kb7  47. dxe7 Rxe7  48. Rxg7 Rxg7  49. Nc5+ Kc6  50. Rxg7 c3
is way better.
moves.44... Kc7 45. Rxb3 Nb6 46. Qb5 Nc4: Blunder and missed opportunity to checkmate opponent in 8 moves… Nc4 46.  Rxe6  Kd8  47. Qc6 Rh8  48. Qxd5+ Nd6  49. Rxd6+ Kc8  50. Rc6+ Qc7  51. Rxc7+ Kxc7  52. Na6+ Kc8  53. Rb8#
